titleStmt.title: Discourses concerning government, in a way of dialogue wherein, by observations drawn from other kingdoms and states, the excellency of the English government is demonstrated, the causes of the decay thereof are considered, and proper remedies for cure proposed / by Henry Nevill ...
Plato redivivus. 1698
titleStmt.author: Neville, Henry, 1620-1694.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed, and sold by A. Baldwin ...,

notesStmt.note: "First published 1681 under title: Plato redivivus"--CLU in OCLC.

"An un-Platonic dialogue developing a scheme for the exercise of the royal prerogative through councils of state responsible to Parliament, and of which a third part should retire every year"--DNB, v. 40, p. 260.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
